name: @tts-local/electron
description: TTS Local - Text-to-Speech desktop application powered by Piper

scripts.package:mac: pnpm prebuild:mac && pnpm build && electron-builder --mac --arm64 --publish never --config electron-builder.yml
scripts.package:mac-x64: pnpm prebuild:mac-x64 && pnpm build && electron-builder --mac --x64 --publish never --config electron-builder.yml
scripts.package:win: pnpm prebuild:win && pnpm build && electron-builder --win --publish never --config electron-builder.yml
scripts.package:linux: pnpm prebuild:linux && pnpm build && electron-builder --linux --publish never --config electron-builder.yml
